title: Himi 369
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko hai ‘e ‘ala fakahā,
Pe fatu nai ‘e hai?
‘A e lahi ‘o e malaʻia
Na’a tau tākoto ai.
2.
He luo taumama’o fau,
He maama ngotofu’u;
Ko ia pē na’a tau nofo ai,
Fakapo’uli tu’u.
3.
Na’e ‘ikai ha’
a
tau fakatu’a
Ki ha lelei ka fai;
He ‘amanaki houhau pē
Oku tu’
u
nuku mai.
4.
Ko Sīsū na’a ne ‘afio’
i
‘A hotau mala’ia,
Pea ne finangalo ai
Ke fakahaofia.
5.
Tu’u mei he potu to’
o
mata’u
Taloni he ‘Otua,
‘O ne ha’anu hifo ai
‘O tu’u ‘i he fonua.
6.
Ne ‘ai pē ‘a e kakano ia,
Ne hoko ko e tu’a,
Ne mate ke ne vete ai
‘A hotau fu’u mo’ua.
7.
‘Ē, ka ne ngutu pe kotoa
‘A hoku memipa,
‘E si’i pe ia ke fakahā
‘A e ‘ofa fau ko ia.
8.
Tokoni mai, kau ‘āngelo,
Tā ho’mou ha’
a
pe koul
a
;
Kae ‘ikai lava ke malau
‘A e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua.*
